front.title: CHECKING OF MESSAGE INTEGRITY DURING SMTP TRANSACTIONS

abstract.t: This Internet Draft describes an extension to the SMTP Services whichwill enable an SMTP Server/Client to check the Integrity of Mailsreceived by it and immediately request for the Mail to be resent ifit is found to be corrupted during that particular transaction.This extension is meant to apply to both SMTP Clients and Servers asdescribed in detail below.
